outputs.output_descr: Operationalize Orissa Resettlement & Rehabilitation (R&R) Policy, 2006 to address the issues arising out of displacement of people due to industrial, mining and irrigation projects. Project focuses to help improve the efficacy of the R&R policy in the State as well as to facilitate its replication in other states with similar developmental context.

project_descr: Capacity Development to Operationalize the Orissa Resettlement and Rehabilitation Policy, 2006.
project_title: Capacity Development to Operationalize the Orissa Resett
